title: Context-Based Personalized Mathematical Learning Design: Data Analysis Competency Enhancement for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic operations and experience using graphic calculators
context.additional_context: Real-life scenario-based project progress utilizing working professionals' job experiences

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply three or more mathematical models (statistics, probability, functions) using job-related data.
Learners perform personalized feedback learning activities at least twice weekly through an intelligent tutoring system based on individual learning patterns.
Learners produce and present at least two data analysis reports and visualizations for workplace problem-solving as team project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
